item.title: Samsung launches new phone trade-in program where you don't have to buy a new phone - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Samsung launches new phone trade-in program where you don't have to buy a new phone

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Samsung News

Samsung has initiated a trial of the Galaxy Trade-In Program, allowing customers to gain value from their old devices without needing to purchase a new phone. Currently operating in South Korea and France, this program accepts various Galaxy models for trade-in.

  • The program is designed to support a circular economy.
  • Eligible devices include Galaxy S20, S21, S22, S23 series, and Z Fold and Flip models.
  • Payments vary based on the condition of the devices categorized as Excellent, Good, or Recycle.
  • The program is expected to expand to more markets later this year.
“We’re excited to launch our brand-new year-round Galaxy Trade-In Program in an effort to enrich the value of Galaxy devices for users and contribute to a circular economy,” said Jun Kim, EVP and Head of Galaxy Value Innovation team, Mobile eXperience Business at Samsung Electronics.

This innovative program highlights Samsung's commitment to sustainability and customer value, setting a new benchmark in the phone trade-in landscape.

item.title: Ahead Of Galaxy S25 Series Launch, Samsung Launches New Galaxy Trade-In Programme - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Samsung Launches New Galaxy Trade-In Programme Ahead of Galaxy S25 Series Launch

Date: 14 Jan 2025 Source: NDTV Profit Tech

Samsung has announced a new Galaxy Trade-In Programme that allows users to trade in eligible Galaxy devices for instant credit towards purchasing new devices on Samsung.com. The programme is set to pilot in Korea and France starting January 14, 2025, ahead of the anticipated launch of the Galaxy S25 series.

  • The trade-in programme allows instant credit at checkout for eligible devices.
  • Eligible devices include Galaxy S23, S22, S21, S20 series, Galaxy Z Fold5, and other Fold/Flip models.
  • The programme aims for broader availability across regions throughout 2025.
  • Instructions for participation and trade-in requirements have been outlined by Samsung.
“The new Samsung programme will pilot in Korea and France starting Jan. 14 and expand to more regions through 2025.”

This trade-in initiative is expected to enhance user engagement and encourage upgrades to the latest Galaxy devices.

item.title: Upgrade Your Smartphone Game with POCO X7 Pro, Priced at ₹24,999 on Flipkart - India.com
item.description:
Upgrade Your Smartphone Game with POCO X7 Pro, Priced at ₹24,999 on Flipkart

Publication Date: Not provided Source: India.com

POCO has launched the POCO X7 Pro, now available on Flipkart starting at ₹24,999. The device offers several launch day offers, including an instant ₹1000 discount with a special coupon, available for today only.

  • POCO X7 Pro launched on Flipkart.
  • Price starts at ₹24,999.
  • Launch day offers include a ₹1000 discount with a coupon.

Overall, the POCO X7 Pro aims to enhance the smartphone experience for users with exciting offers.

item.title: Vivo T3 Ultra and T3 Pro receive a price cut in India: Here’s how much the phones cost now - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Vivo T3 Ultra and T3 Pro receive a price cut in India: Here’s how much the phones cost now

Date: January 14, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

Vivo has officially announced a price cut for two of its mid-range smartphones, the T3 Pro and T3 Ultra, reducing their prices by Rs 2000.

  • The T3 Pro is now priced at Rs 22,999 for the 128GB variant and Rs 24,999 for the 256GB variant.
  • The T3 Ultra's new pricing details were not specified in the provided content.
“The company has officially reduced the prices of both devices by Rs 2000 across all the colours and variants.”

This price reduction indicates Vivo's strategy to remain competitive in the mid-range smartphone market in India.

item.title: Can artificial intelligence replace the human touch in beauty? - VOGUE India
item.description:
Can artificial intelligence replace the human touch in beauty?

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Vogue India

The article explores the growing role of artificial intelligence (AI) in the beauty industry, highlighting both its potential and limitations. While AI tools can analyze skin conditions and recommend products, many users find that they lack the personalized care and empathy that human experts provide.

  • AI is becoming prevalent in skincare consultations.
  • Some users have mixed experiences with AI-based skin analyzers comparing to consultations with dermatologists.
  • Experts caution that AI cannot fully replace human understanding and sensitivity in beauty care.
  • Brands are increasingly blending AI technology with human expertise to enhance customer experiences.
“While I was looking to update my skincare routine, artificial intelligence alone couldn't convince me to spend thousands on eight new products.”

In conclusion, while AI in skincare offers exciting advancements, it currently lacks the empathy and nuanced understanding that personal interactions with beauty professionals provide.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra price dropped by 20% ahead of Galaxy S25 Ultra launch- All details | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Price Dropped 20% Before Galaxy S25 Ultra Launch

Publication Date: Upcoming Release
Source: Hindustan Times

The price of the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra has significantly dropped ahead of the launch of the Galaxy S25 series, making it available at a more affordable rate just before the new model's release.

  • Samsung Galaxy Unpacked event is scheduled for next week.
  • The Galaxy S24 Ultra is currently priced at ₹107,990 after a 20% discount from its original price of ₹134,999 in India.
  • Additional discounts available through bank and exchange offers on e-commerce platforms like Amazon.
  • The S24 Ultra features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, a 200MP main camera, and a long-lasting 5000mAh battery.
"This price drop may also be the result of the online Amazon Republic Day Sale."

In conclusion, this significant discount on the S24 Ultra offers a great opportunity for buyers as the new generation models are set to launch soon.

item.title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra edges closer to India launch with BIS certification: All we know so far | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Motorola Razr 60 Ultra edges closer to India launch with BIS certification: All we know so far

Publication Date: Not specified Source: 91Mobiles

Motorola's latest smartphone in the flip series, the Motorola Razr 60 Ultra, has been spotted on the Bureau Of Indian Standards (BIS) website, indicating a potential upcoming launch in India.

  • The smartphone appears with the model number XT2551 and codename Orion.
  • It is expected to feature the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Elite processor.
  • An upgrade over the Razr 50 series, it may launch around mid-2025.
  • The Razr 50 Ultra boasts impressive specifications including a 6.9-inch full-HD+ display and a powerful camera setup.
“If the BIS listing turns out to be true, it would mean that Motorola could be planning to launch the new flip series in India soon.”

In conclusion, the Motorola Razr 60 Ultra is generating interest as a potential upgrade in the highly competitive foldable smartphone market, with many looking forward to its launch in India.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series launch: 10 things to expect from Samsung’s upcoming flagship phones - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Launch: 10 Things to Expect from Samsung’s Upcoming Flagship Phones

Date: January 14, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

Samsung is set to launch its Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on January 22, introducing several new features and changes over the S24 series. Here are the top 10 anticipated changes.

  • Launch Date: Samsung Galaxy S25 series will be launched on January 22.
  • Three Models: Expected models include Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra.
  • Galaxy S25 Slim: Rumored model alongside others, pending confirmation.
  • New Processor: Anticipated to run on Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processors.
  • Exynos Possibility: Some models may feature Exynos chips in specific markets.
  • Galaxy AI Enhancements: Introduction of new AI features and improvements.
  • Subscription for AI Features: Potential subscription service for additional features.
  • Free Gemini AI Subscription: Up to one year free subscription with the phone.
  • Camera Improvements: Anticipated upgrades particularly for S25 Ultra.
  • One UI 7: Introduction of the latest user interface based on Android 15.
“Samsung is expected to introduce the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event.”

The Galaxy S25 series is shaping up to be a significant release for Samsung, with advancements in technology and user experience expected to captivate users.

item.title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025: Best Deals on Tablets - Gadgets 360
item.description:

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 has begun, providing shoppers opportunities to grab discounts on a wide range of products, including tablets. The sale started for Prime members at midnight, and for all users at noon.

item.title: Vivo T3 Ultra, T3 Pro prices officially reduced in India. How much do they cost now? | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Vivo T3 Ultra, T3 Pro prices officially reduced in India. How much do they cost now?

Published on: TBD Source: Live Mint

Vivo has announced a significant price reduction for its Vivo T3 Ultra and T3 Pro smartphones, positioning them competitively in the mid-range market amidst new releases from Poco and Realme.

  • Both Vivo T3 Ultra and T3 Pro have received a ₹2,000 price cut.
  • The T3 Pro is now priced at ₹22,999 for the 8GB RAM/128GB storage variant and ₹24,999 for the 8GB RAM/256GB variant.
  • The T3 Ultra starts at ₹29,999 and goes up to ₹33,999 for the top model.
  • T3 Ultra features a 6.78-inch 3D curved AMOLED display and is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9200+ chipset.
  • T3 Pro is equipped with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor and features a 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED display.
“Vivo claims the T3 Ultra achieves an impressive Antutu benchmark score exceeding 1.6 million.”

The price cuts are seen as a strategic move by Vivo in response to competition in the mid-range smartphone market.

item.title: Samsung introduces Ring in two larger sizes ahead of Galaxy Unpacked 2025 - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung introduces new larger sizes for Galaxy Ring ahead of 2025 Unpacked event

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Samsung News

The latest updates from Samsung include the introduction of two larger sizes for the Galaxy Ring, expanding its wearable options, set to launch during the Galaxy Unpacked event.

Samsung has introduced two new larger sizes for the Galaxy Ring, its lightweight health and wellness wearable. The Galaxy Ring is now available in eleven sizes, ranging from size 5 to size 15, with size 14 and size 15 being the new additions. These new sizes will be available for purchase starting January 22, coinciding with the company’s first Galaxy Unpacked event of 2025.

  • The new sizes are available for purchase starting January 22.
  • The Galaxy Ring features a durable, lightweight design made from Grade 5 titanium.
  • It has an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance, able to withstand up to 100 metres depth.
  • Samsung claims a battery life of up to seven days per charge.
  • Updates to the Samsung Health app focus on sleep, wellness, and integration with SmartThings.
“The Galaxy Ring supports Galaxy AI for generating detailed health reports focused on various health metrics.”

These new developments position Samsung's Galaxy Ring and Health app at the forefront of health and wellness technology.

item.title: Samsung Teases AI Capabilities in Bixby Virtual Assistant Ahead of Galaxy S25 Series Launch - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Teases AI-Powered Bixby Assistant

Publication Date: Monday

Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung recently shared a teaser video showcasing the upcoming AI capabilities of its virtual assistant, Bixby, expected to launch with the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22.

  • The teaser video demonstrates Bixby's ability to understand natural language and perform multiple tasks.
  • Initially released in China, the AI assistant showed enhanced context understanding and can respond using web-sourced texts and videos.
  • Bixby may also integrate better with third-party applications for tasks like making reservations.
  • There are indications of a redesigned interface for a more user-friendly experience.
“A true AI companion is coming” - Samsung

In conclusion, the advancements in Bixby may significantly enhance user interaction and functionality for Samsung device users, marking an exciting development in AI virtual assistance.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Ring to get two new sizes, improved sleep tracking features and more later this month - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy Ring to Get Two New Sizes and Enhanced Sleep Tracking

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: Moneycontrol

Ahead of the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event, Samsung has confirmed that it will introduce two new larger sizes for the Galaxy Ring along with expanded sleep tracking capabilities via the Samsung Health app. The Galaxy Ring will now range from sizes 5 to 15, with the new sizes (14 and 15) available starting January 22. Additionally, the wearable will be available in 15 new markets starting in February, increasing its global presence to 53 regions.

Key Points

  • New sizes for Galaxy Ring will be from 5 to 15, with sizes 14 and 15 available from January 22.
  • Expanded availability in 15 new markets starting in February.
  • Enhanced sleep tracking features in Samsung Health:
    • Sleep environment report: Provides insights into room conditions.
    • Sleep Time Guidance: Suggests ideal bedtimes based on habits.
    • Mindfulness Tracker: Supports mental health with breathing and meditation guides.

Conclusion

The updates to the Galaxy Ring and Samsung Health app represent a significant advancement in wearables, aiming to improve user experience and health insights.

item.title: Best time to buy iPhone 16 for less than Rs 70000: Republic Day Sale on Flipkart and Amazon is live - India TV News
item.description:
Best time to buy iPhone 16 for less than Rs 70000: Republic Day Sale on Flipkart and Amazon is live

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: India TV News

The Republic Day Sale 2025 has started, revealing a significant price drop for the Apple iPhone 16. It's now available for Rs 69,999, making it a great opportunity for consumers to purchase the premium smartphone.

Key Points:

  • The iPhone 16 (128 GB) is priced at Rs 69,999, down from Rs 79,900.
  • Features include the A18 chipset, a new action button for quick feature access, and enhanced camera controls.
  • AI features include iOS 18 tools like Genmoji and Image Playground.
  • Concerns about display durability and technical glitches have been reported by early buyers.
"A number of glitches and issues were discovered by some experts and Apple enthusiasts."

In conclusion, while the price drop offers an appealing deal for the iPhone 16, potential buyers should consider user reports of issues with the device before making a purchase.

In conclusion, the Amazon Great Republic Day Sale offers huge savings for those looking to upgrade their PC accessories, with multiple options to suit different needs and budgets.

item.title: Oneplus 13R sale starts in India: Check out price, launch offers, and more - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Oneplus 13R is now available for sale in online and offline stores, check out the price and launch offers.

Published on: January 14, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Oneplus 13R was launched on January 7, 2025, and is being marketed as a flagship killer offering promising performance in multitasking and photography, with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor and upgraded camera features.

Oneplus 13R sale: Price, offers, and benefits

  • Starting price: Rs.42999 for 12GB RAM, 256GB storage.
  • 16GB RAM, 512GB storage priced at Rs.49999.

Why you should buy Oneplus 13R?

The Oneplus 13R features a 6.77-inch ProXDR display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and a triple camera setup including a 50MP main camera, positioned to deliver flagship-like features at a competitive price.

item.title: iPhone 16 drops to OnePlus 13’s price – Which phone should you buy this Republic Day Sale? | Mint - Mint
item.description:
iPhone 16 drops to OnePlus 13’s price – Which phone should you buy this Republic Day Sale?

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: LiveMint

Apple's iPhone 16 is now on sale for ₹69,999 during the Republic Day Sale, making it comparably priced to the OnePlus 13. This article explores the specifications and features of both flagship smartphones to help consumers decide which to purchase.

iPhone 16 price cut in India:

The iPhone 16, available for ₹69,999, features the A18 chipset, support for iOS 18, and enhanced AI capabilities. It was originally launched at ₹79,900.

iPhone 16 specifications:

  • A18 chipset with 30% faster CPU and 40% faster GPU.
  • New Action Button for quick feature access.
  • Latest iOS 18 with AI features.

OnePlus 13 specifications:

  • 6.82-inch 120Hz ProXDR display.
  • Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.
  • 6,000mAh battery with fast charging features.

The OnePlus 13 offers a competitive display and battery life, while the iPhone 16 promises longer software support and unique Apple features.

“Apple fanatics really only have one option in this price range, and that is the iPhone 16.”

Ultimately, consumer preference between iOS and Android may dictate the choice between these two devices.

item.title: Can the iQOO 13 take on the mantle of being the new ‘flagship killer’? | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Can the iQOO 13 take on the mantle of being the new ‘flagship killer’?

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Mint

The iQOO 13 aims to challenge the flagship smartphone market with its impressive specifications at a competitive price point, notably featuring the new Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and enhanced battery capacity.

  • iQOO continues the tradition of offering high-end features at lower prices, reminiscent of OnePlus's earlier marketing strategy.
  • The iQOO 13 starts at Rs. 52,999, undercutting anticipated prices of rivals like OnePlus 13 and Samsung S25 series.
  • Key enhancements include a 6000mAh battery, a boost from the previous model's 5000mAh, without significant weight increase.
  • The design closely resembles the iQOO 12, with minor adjustments to the camera layout and aesthetics.
“There is no catch, and save for a few nitpicks on the camera setup, there’s really no compromise to be found.”

The iQOO 13 presents itself as a strong contender in the flagship segment, challenging established brands by blending high performance with affordability.

item.title: Carl Pei teases Nothing Phone (3) launch, flagship coming by March 2025 - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Carl Pei teases Nothing Phone (3) launch, flagship coming by March 2025

Date: Jan 14, 2025 | Source: CNBC TV18

Nothing is set to launch the Nothing Phone (3) by March 2025, marking its entry into the flagship smartphone market.

  • The Nothing Phone (3) will run on an older chipset like Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 or MediaTek Dimensity 9200+.
  • Expected features include up to 12 GB of RAM, 512 GB of storage, and Nothing OS 3.0 based on Android 15.
  • The design may include a 6.5-inch LTPO AMOLED display and a customisable Action Button.
  • Battery capacity is expected to be 5,000 mAh with 45W fast charging support.
  • The anticipated price is around ₹50,000.
“Nothing Phone (3) will introduce breakthrough innovations in user interface, taking our first step toward our AI-powered platform.” - Carl Pei

The Nothing Phone (3) aims to bring significant innovations to the smartphone market as the company expands its product lineup.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Price Drops By Over Rs 23000 Ahead Of Galaxy S25 Series Launch On January 22: Should You Bu - Times Now
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 Price Drops By Over Rs 23000 Ahead Of Galaxy S25 Series Launch On January 22: Should You Buy?

Publication Date: Unknown

Source: Unknown

Samsung has reduced the price of its Galaxy S24 by over Rs 23,000 ahead of the Galaxy S25 series launch on January 22, making it a tempting deal for buyers.

  • The Galaxy S24 (256GB) is now priced at Rs 56,849 after a discount of Rs 23,150.
  • An additional 5% discount is available with an Amazon Pay ICICI Bank credit card, lowering the price to Rs 54,000.
  • No-cost EMI options start at Rs 9,475 per month.
  • Up to Rs 45,000 off is available when exchanging an older device.
  • The Galaxy S24 features a 6.2-inch FHD+ Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 2400 processor, and a 4,000mAh battery.
  • Camera setup includes a 50MP primary lens, a 12MP ultrawide, and a 10MP telephoto lens.
“The Galaxy S24 remains a compelling choice for those who want flagship features without breaking the bank.”

In conclusion, the Galaxy S24 is an attractive option for buyers looking for flagship features at a discounted price, while those wanting the latest technology may consider waiting for the Galaxy S25 series.

item.title: Apple Arcade Launches 10 New Games: Final Fantasy, Skate City: New York, PGA Tour Pro Golf, More - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Apple Arcade Launches 10 New Games: Final Fantasy, Skate City: New York, PGA Tour Pro Golf, More

Date: 14 Jan 2025, Source: NDTV Profit Tech

Apple Arcade has expanded its offerings with the addition of seven new games, including popular titles like Final Fantasy and Skate City: New York, with no ads or in-app purchases.

  • New Games: Notable additions include Skate City: New York, Gears & Goo, and Three Kingdoms Heroes.
  • Upcoming Release: PGA Tour Pro Golf launches on Feb. 6, featuring official PGA locations.
  • Updates: The platform will see updates to existing titles, including new games like Word Wright and seasonal content in Hello Kitty Island Adventure.
  • Subscription Model: Apple Arcade costs $6.99 per month, with a one-month free trial available.
"Apple Arcade is available for $6.99 per month with a one-month free trial. A single subscription works for six people, and over 200 games are available."

With these new additions, Apple Arcade continues to enhance its gaming platform, appealing to a wider audience by offering diverse gameplay experiences.

item.title: Poco F7 Pro, Poco F7 Ultra Reportedly Listed on Indonesia Telecom Site; Could Launch Soon - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Poco F7 Pro, F7 Ultra Spied on Indonesian Regulator's Site Ahead of Launch

Publication Date: N/A

Source: Gadgets 360

The Poco F7 Pro and F7 Ultra are set to launch soon, following their appearance on Indonesia Telecom's certification site. The listings reveal their model numbers but no specific launch date from Xiaomi's sub-brand.

  • Poco F7 Pro is expected to be a rebranded Redmi K80.
  • Poco F7 Ultra is likely a rebranded Redmi K80 Pro.
  • Both devices have been listed with model numbers 24117RK2CG (F7 Pro) and 24122RKC7G (F7 Ultra).
  • Rumored specifications for F7 Pro include a 6.67-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, and a 50-megapixel camera.
  • F7 Ultra might come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and a triple rear camera setup.
“The Redmi K80 series has been available in China since last November with a starting price of CNY 2,499.”

This upcoming launch highlights the Poco brand's effort to cater to various market segments with rebranded global variants that combine powerful hardware with competitive pricing.
